EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.spiritaeronautics.com/]]>
Your aircraft is a big investment – an investment worth protecting. The Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics (formally known as HAPP) is the perfect solution for fixed-wing operators who want to keep their aircraft flying and control their annual maintenance budget with the industry’s premier fixed-price protection plan.
Enroll in the Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan and receive:
- Reduction of general maintenance costs
- Emergency support 24 hours, 7 days a week, in case of AOG - Access to Honeywell's global stock and partner network - Options that allow you to customize your protection plan based on your aircraft and operational needs
Save time and money and gain peace of mind knowing your aircraft is covered under a program that protects more than 3,800 aircraft worldwide!
Contact Spirit Aeronautics at (614) 344-9195 <tel:614-344-9195> or by clicking below to learn more about this program and enroll today.
I WANT TO PROTECT MY INVESTMENT! <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/control-the-unexpected-and-keep-your-aircraft-where-it-belongs-in-the-sky?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_spiritaero_msp-avionics&utm_content=customer+form+fill]]>
